thread.title: Auto executives praise Trump after meeting
thread.title_full: Auto executives praise Trump after meeting

author: AP
title: Auto executives praise Trump after meeting
text: Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Auto executives praise Trump after meeting Automotive executives Tuesday praised President Donald Trump, after holding a morning meeting with him in the White House, for his focus on growing jobs and investment in their industry. (Jan. 24) Post to Facebook Auto executives praise Trump after meeting Automotive executives Tuesday praised President Donald Trump, after holding a morning meeting with him in the White House, for his focus on growing jobs and investment in their industry.
